				<div id="post-117" class="post-117 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-soap-request category-wsdl-scanning tag-soap-request tag-wsdl-scanning">
											<h2 class="entry-title"><a href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/" rel="bookmark">WebGoat Week 10</a></h2>					
					<div class="entry-meta">
						<span class="meta-prep meta-prep-author">Posted on</span> <a href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/" title="10:30 am" rel="bookmark"><span class="entry-date">September 24, 2012</span></a>						<span class="by-author"><span class="sep">by</span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/author/ma5t3rx/" title="View all posts by Ma5t3rX" rel="author">Ma5t3rX</a></span> </span>					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						<p>This is the last in a series of ten posts for the OWSAP WebGoat vulnerable web application. New posts for WebGoat will post every Monday.</p>
<p><strong>Session Fixation</strong></p>
<p>For this task you are the hacker named Joe and you are trying to steal a session from a user named Jane. You are instructed to send an email that has already been prepared to Jane which looks like an official bank email. You are told that you need to add the sessionID (SID) to the email which will be appended to the link in the fake email.</p>
<p>To append the SID to the link you will need to use this:</p>
<p>&amp;SID=sessionID where sessionID is whatever you would like</p>
<p>So enter the appeneded statement to the link and click the Send Mail button.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="278" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/1-12/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg" data-orig-size="511,291" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="1" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=511" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-278" title="1" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg 511w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 511px) 100vw, 511px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="279" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/2-12/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg" data-orig-size="547,341" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="2" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=547" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-279" title="2" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg 547w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 547px) 100vw, 547px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now you are acting as Jane looking at the email she received from the hacker Joe. Click on the link you see for Goat Hills Financial.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="280" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/3-11/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg" data-orig-size="501,487" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="3" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=501" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-280" title="3" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg 501w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 501px) 100vw, 501px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now you, as Jane, are prompted to enter your name and password.</p>
<p>You can see that the SID is visible in the URL bar:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="281" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/4-11/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg" data-orig-size="541,35" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="4" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=541" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-281" title="4" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg 541w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 541px) 100vw, 541px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now login as Jane with password tarzan:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="282" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/5-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg" data-orig-size="412,301" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="5" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=412" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-282" title="5" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg 412w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 412px) 100vw, 412px"   /></a></p>
<p>Click the Login button to continue.</p>
<p>Now that Jane has logged in using her credentials we can hijack her session because we know the SID. You are told to follow the link to reach the login screen.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="283" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/6-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg" data-orig-size="605,34" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="6" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=605" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-283" title="6" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg 605w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 605px) 100vw, 605px"   /></a></p>
<p>As you see the SID is not what we need it to be to hijack Jane’s session&#8230;yet. Let’s change the SID to 0wn3d to continue and go to that address with the updated SID.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="284" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/7-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg" data-orig-size="554,41" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="7" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=554" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-284" title="7" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg 554w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 554px) 100vw, 554px"   /></a></p>
<p>After going to the address you can see that we have hijacked Jane’s session:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="285" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/8-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg" data-orig-size="470,370" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="8" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=470" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-285" title="8" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg 470w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 470px) 100vw, 470px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>Web Services</strong></p>
<p><strong>Create a SOAP Request</strong></p>
<p>The create a SOAP request lesson wants you to connect to the web service description language (WSDL). You are given a URL for the web service at:</p>
<p><a href="http://localhost/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest">http://localhost/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest</a></p>
<p>You are also told that you can view the WSDL by adding ?WSDL on the end of the web service request.</p>
<p>To complete the lesson you have to look at the WSDL and determine the number of operations that are defined in teh WSDL. Once you have this information enter it into the textbox and click the Submit button.</p>
<p>First enter the below address into your web browser and go to it.</p>
<p><a href="http://127.0.0.1:8088/">http://127.0.0.1:8088/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest?WSDL</a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="286" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/9-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg" data-orig-size="432,33" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="9" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=432" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-286" title="9" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg 432w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 432px) 100vw, 432px"   /></a></p>
<p>You should see the WSDL file, now just figure out how many operations this file has defined.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="287" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/10-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg" data-orig-size="448,241" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="10" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=448" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-287" title="10" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg 448w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 448px) 100vw, 448px"   /></a></p>
<p>I see four in total.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="288" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/11-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg" data-orig-size="533,122" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="11" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=533" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-288" title="11" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg 533w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 533px) 100vw, 533px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="289" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/12-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg" data-orig-size="555,169" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="12" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=555" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-289" title="12" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg 555w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 555px) 100vw, 555px"   /></a></p>
<p>Next up we are prompted to type in the id parameter in the getFirstNameRequest method.</p>
<p>The type for the getFirstNameRequest is int</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="290" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/13-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg" data-orig-size="430,46" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="13" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=430" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-290" title="13" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg 430w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 430px) 100vw, 430px"   /></a></p>
<p>Type int into the textbox and click the Submit button.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="291" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/14-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg" data-orig-size="547,196" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="14" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=547" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-291" title="14" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg 547w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 547px) 100vw, 547px"   /></a></p>
<p>Next we are told to intercept the request and invoke any method by sending a valid SOAP request for a valid account. Press Generate an HTTP Request and go to WebScarab and take a look at the webservices. Make sure the WSDL is correct,a nd verify the operation, finally modify the value field with 101 and execute it.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="292" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/15-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg" data-orig-size="605,116" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="15" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=605" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-292" title="15" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg 605w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 605px) 100vw, 605px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>WSDL Scanning</strong></p>
<p>This lesson we are tasked with trying to get credit card number from a database through a web service.</p>
<p>We are told to reference a WSDL file to assist us with getting this information. Go ahead and open up the file that is linked and take a look around. You should see a parameter named getCreditCard:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="293" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/16-8/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg" data-orig-size="594,70" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="16" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=594" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-293" title="16" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg 594w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 594px) 100vw, 594px"   /></a></p>
<p>On with the attack, first select any one of the elements in the listbox and make sure that 101 is in the id textbox. Start the Tamper Data service; click the Submit button followed by the Tamper button. Next change the field parameter to getCreditCard and click the OK button:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="294" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/17-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg" data-orig-size="583,201" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="17" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=583" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-294" title="17" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg 583w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 583px) 100vw, 583px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="295" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/18-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg" data-orig-size="397,219" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="18" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=397" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-295" title="18" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg 397w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 397px) 100vw, 397px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>Web Service SAX Injection</strong></p>
<p>This lesson we are going to use a SOAP request to execute a function defined in the WSDL file.</p>
<p>The goal of this lesson is to reset the password for a user who is different than the user who has user-ID 101.</p>
<p>When the password textbox has a value  in it and the Go button is pressed an XML request is created, submitted and parsed by the SAX server:</p>
<p>&lt;?xml version=&#8217;1.0&#8242; encoding=&#8217;UTF-8&#8242;?&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;wsns0:Envelope</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsi=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsd=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns0=&#8217;<a href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns1=&#8217;<a href="http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt" rel="nofollow">http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt</a>;</p>
<p>? &lt;wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;101&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;[password]&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>? &lt;/wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;/wsns0:Envelope&gt;</p>
<p>To complete this attack we need to ensure that the XML request that is sent to the server is this:</p>
<p>&lt;?xml version=&#8217;1.0&#8242; encoding=&#8217;UTF-8&#8242;?&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;wsns0:Envelope</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsi=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsd=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns0=&#8217;<a href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns1=&#8217;<a href="http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt" rel="nofollow">http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt</a>;</p>
<p>? &lt;wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;101&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;[password]&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;102&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;newpassword&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>? &lt;/wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;/wsns0:Envelope&gt;</p>
<p>In order to accomplish this we need to inject this statement:</p>
<p>ewpassword&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;102&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;newpassword</p>
<p>We cannot do this within the textbox form due to HTML field limitations. Open up the Tamer Data tool and start the service. Click the Go button and then the Tamper button. In the password field enter the injection code from above and click OK.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="296" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/19-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg" data-orig-size="579,163" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="19" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=579" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-296" title="19" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg 579w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 579px) 100vw, 579px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="297" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/20-6/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg" data-orig-size="419,182" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="20" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=419" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-297" title="20" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg 419w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 419px) 100vw, 419px"   /></a></p>
<p>Join us again next Monday when we start the series on WebMaven.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
var highlander_expando_javascript = function(){
	var input = document.createElement( 'input' ),
	    comment = jQuery( '#comment' );

	if ( 'placeholder' in input ) {
		comment.attr( 'placeholder', jQuery( '.comment-textarea label' ).remove().text() );
	}

	// Expando Mode: start small, then auto-resize on first click + text length
	jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).hide();

	comment.css( { 'height':'10px' } ).one( 'focus', function() {
		var timer = setInterval( HighlanderComments.resizeCallback, 10 )
		jQuery( this ).animate( { 'height': HighlanderComments.initialHeight } ).delay( 100 ).queue( function(n) { clearInterval( timer ); HighlanderComments.resizeCallback(); n(); } );
		jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).slideDown();
	});
}
jQuery(document).ready( highlander_expando_javascript );
</script>

var WPGroHo = {"my_hash":""};

<script type='text/javascript' src='https://s1.wp.com/wp-content/mu-plugins/gravatar-hovercards/wpgroho.js?m=1380573781h'></script>

	<script>
		//initialize and attach hovercards to all gravatars
		jQuery( document ).ready( function( $ ) {

			if (typeof Gravatar === "undefined"){
				return;
			}

			if ( typeof Gravatar.init !== "function" ) {
				return;
			}			

			Gravatar.profile_cb = function( hash, id ) {
				WPGroHo.syncProfileData( hash, id );
			};
			Gravatar.my_hash = WPGroHo.my_hash;
			Gravatar.init( 'body', '#wp-admin-bar-my-account' );
		});
	</script>

				<div id="post-117" class="post-117 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-soap-request category-wsdl-scanning tag-soap-request tag-wsdl-scanning">
											<h2 class="entry-title"><a href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/" rel="bookmark">WebGoat Week 10</a></h2>					
					<div class="entry-meta">
						<span class="meta-prep meta-prep-author">Posted on</span> <a href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/" title="10:30 am" rel="bookmark"><span class="entry-date">September 24, 2012</span></a>						<span class="by-author"><span class="sep">by</span> <span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/author/ma5t3rx/" title="View all posts by Ma5t3rX" rel="author">Ma5t3rX</a></span> </span>					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->

					<div class="entry-content">
						<p>This is the last in a series of ten posts for the OWSAP WebGoat vulnerable web application. New posts for WebGoat will post every Monday.</p>
<p><strong>Session Fixation</strong></p>
<p>For this task you are the hacker named Joe and you are trying to steal a session from a user named Jane. You are instructed to send an email that has already been prepared to Jane which looks like an official bank email. You are told that you need to add the sessionID (SID) to the email which will be appended to the link in the fake email.</p>
<p>To append the SID to the link you will need to use this:</p>
<p>&amp;SID=sessionID where sessionID is whatever you would like</p>
<p>So enter the appeneded statement to the link and click the Send Mail button.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="278" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/1-12/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg" data-orig-size="511,291" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="1" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=511" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-278" title="1" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg 511w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/114.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 511px) 100vw, 511px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="279" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/2-12/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg" data-orig-size="547,341" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="2" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=547" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-279" title="2" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg 547w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/27.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 547px) 100vw, 547px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now you are acting as Jane looking at the email she received from the hacker Joe. Click on the link you see for Goat Hills Financial.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="280" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/3-11/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg" data-orig-size="501,487" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="3" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=501" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-280" title="3" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg 501w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/33.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 501px) 100vw, 501px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now you, as Jane, are prompted to enter your name and password.</p>
<p>You can see that the SID is visible in the URL bar:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="281" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/4-11/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg" data-orig-size="541,35" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="4" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=541" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-281" title="4" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg 541w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/43.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 541px) 100vw, 541px"   /></a></p>
<p>Now login as Jane with password tarzan:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="282" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/5-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg" data-orig-size="412,301" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="5" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=412" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-282" title="5" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg 412w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/53.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 412px) 100vw, 412px"   /></a></p>
<p>Click the Login button to continue.</p>
<p>Now that Jane has logged in using her credentials we can hijack her session because we know the SID. You are told to follow the link to reach the login screen.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="283" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/6-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg" data-orig-size="605,34" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="6" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=605" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-283" title="6" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg 605w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/63.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 605px) 100vw, 605px"   /></a></p>
<p>As you see the SID is not what we need it to be to hijack Jane’s session&#8230;yet. Let’s change the SID to 0wn3d to continue and go to that address with the updated SID.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="284" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/7-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg" data-orig-size="554,41" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="7" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=554" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-284" title="7" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg 554w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/73.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 554px) 100vw, 554px"   /></a></p>
<p>After going to the address you can see that we have hijacked Jane’s session:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="285" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/8-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg" data-orig-size="470,370" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="8" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=470" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-285" title="8" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg 470w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/83.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 470px) 100vw, 470px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>Web Services</strong></p>
<p><strong>Create a SOAP Request</strong></p>
<p>The create a SOAP request lesson wants you to connect to the web service description language (WSDL). You are given a URL for the web service at:</p>
<p><a href="http://localhost/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest">http://localhost/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest</a></p>
<p>You are also told that you can view the WSDL by adding ?WSDL on the end of the web service request.</p>
<p>To complete the lesson you have to look at the WSDL and determine the number of operations that are defined in teh WSDL. Once you have this information enter it into the textbox and click the Submit button.</p>
<p>First enter the below address into your web browser and go to it.</p>
<p><a href="http://127.0.0.1:8088/">http://127.0.0.1:8088/WebGoat/services/SoapRequest?WSDL</a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="286" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/9-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg" data-orig-size="432,33" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="9" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=432" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-286" title="9" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg 432w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/93.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 432px) 100vw, 432px"   /></a></p>
<p>You should see the WSDL file, now just figure out how many operations this file has defined.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="287" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/10-10/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg" data-orig-size="448,241" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="10" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=448" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-287" title="10" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg 448w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/103.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 448px) 100vw, 448px"   /></a></p>
<p>I see four in total.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="288" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/11-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg" data-orig-size="533,122" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="11" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=533" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-288" title="11" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg 533w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/115.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 533px) 100vw, 533px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="289" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/12-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg" data-orig-size="555,169" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="12" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=555" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-289" title="12" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg 555w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/123.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 555px) 100vw, 555px"   /></a></p>
<p>Next up we are prompted to type in the id parameter in the getFirstNameRequest method.</p>
<p>The type for the getFirstNameRequest is int</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="290" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/13-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg" data-orig-size="430,46" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="13" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=430" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-290" title="13" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg 430w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/133.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 430px) 100vw, 430px"   /></a></p>
<p>Type int into the textbox and click the Submit button.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="291" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/14-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg" data-orig-size="547,196" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="14" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=547" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-291" title="14" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg 547w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/143.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 547px) 100vw, 547px"   /></a></p>
<p>Next we are told to intercept the request and invoke any method by sending a valid SOAP request for a valid account. Press Generate an HTTP Request and go to WebScarab and take a look at the webservices. Make sure the WSDL is correct,a nd verify the operation, finally modify the value field with 101 and execute it.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="292" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/15-9/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg" data-orig-size="605,116" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="15" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=605" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-292" title="15" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg 605w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/153.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 605px) 100vw, 605px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>WSDL Scanning</strong></p>
<p>This lesson we are tasked with trying to get credit card number from a database through a web service.</p>
<p>We are told to reference a WSDL file to assist us with getting this information. Go ahead and open up the file that is linked and take a look around. You should see a parameter named getCreditCard:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="293" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/16-8/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg" data-orig-size="594,70" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="16" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=594" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-293" title="16" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg 594w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/163.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 594px) 100vw, 594px"   /></a></p>
<p>On with the attack, first select any one of the elements in the listbox and make sure that 101 is in the id textbox. Start the Tamper Data service; click the Submit button followed by the Tamper button. Next change the field parameter to getCreditCard and click the OK button:</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="294" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/17-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg" data-orig-size="583,201" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="17" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=583" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-294" title="17" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg 583w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/173.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 583px) 100vw, 583px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="295" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/18-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg" data-orig-size="397,219" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="18" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=397" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-295" title="18" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg 397w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/183.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 397px) 100vw, 397px"   /></a></p>
<p><strong>Web Service SAX Injection</strong></p>
<p>This lesson we are going to use a SOAP request to execute a function defined in the WSDL file.</p>
<p>The goal of this lesson is to reset the password for a user who is different than the user who has user-ID 101.</p>
<p>When the password textbox has a value  in it and the Go button is pressed an XML request is created, submitted and parsed by the SAX server:</p>
<p>&lt;?xml version=&#8217;1.0&#8242; encoding=&#8217;UTF-8&#8242;?&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;wsns0:Envelope</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsi=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsd=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns0=&#8217;<a href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns1=&#8217;<a href="http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt" rel="nofollow">http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt</a>;</p>
<p>? &lt;wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;101&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;[password]&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>? &lt;/wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;/wsns0:Envelope&gt;</p>
<p>To complete this attack we need to ensure that the XML request that is sent to the server is this:</p>
<p>&lt;?xml version=&#8217;1.0&#8242; encoding=&#8217;UTF-8&#8242;?&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;wsns0:Envelope</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsi=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:xsd=&#8217;<a href="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns0=&#8217;<a href="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217" rel="nofollow">http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/&#038;#8217</a>;</p>
<p>? xmlns:wsns1=&#8217;<a href="http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt" rel="nofollow">http://lessons.webgoat.owasp.org&#8217;&#038;gt</a>;</p>
<p>? &lt;wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;101&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;[password]&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;102&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;newpassword&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>? &lt;/wsns0:Body&gt;</p>
<p>&lt;/wsns0:Envelope&gt;</p>
<p>In order to accomplish this we need to inject this statement:</p>
<p>ewpassword&lt;/password&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;/wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>??? &lt;wsns1:changePassword&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;id xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:int&#8217;&gt;102&lt;/id&gt;</p>
<p>????? &lt;password xsi:type=&#8217;xsd:string&#8217;&gt;newpassword</p>
<p>We cannot do this within the textbox form due to HTML field limitations. Open up the Tamer Data tool and start the service. Click the Go button and then the Tamper button. In the password field enter the injection code from above and click OK.</p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="296" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/19-7/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg" data-orig-size="579,163" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="19" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=579" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-296" title="19" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg 579w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/193.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 579px) 100vw, 579px"   /></a></p>
<p><a href="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg"><img data-attachment-id="297" data-permalink="https://webapppentest.wordpress.com/2012/09/24/webgoat-week-10/20-6/" data-orig-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg" data-orig-size="419,182" data-comments-opened="1" data-image-meta="{&quot;aperture&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;credit&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;camera&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;created_timestamp&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;copyright&quot;:&quot;&quot;,&quot;focal_length&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;iso&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;shutter_speed&quot;:&quot;0&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;&quot;}" data-image-title="20" data-image-description="" data-medium-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=300" data-large-file="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=419" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-297" title="20" src="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=640" alt="" srcset="https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg 419w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=150 150w, https://webapppentest.files.wordpress.com/2012/09/203.jpg?w=300 300w" sizes="(max-width: 419px) 100vw, 419px"   /></a></p>
<p>Join us again next Monday when we start the series on WebMaven.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
var highlander_expando_javascript = function(){
	var input = document.createElement( 'input' ),
	    comment = jQuery( '#comment' );

	if ( 'placeholder' in input ) {
		comment.attr( 'placeholder', jQuery( '.comment-textarea label' ).remove().text() );
	}

	// Expando Mode: start small, then auto-resize on first click + text length
	jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).hide();
	jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).hide();

	comment.css( { 'height':'10px' } ).one( 'focus', function() {
		var timer = setInterval( HighlanderComments.resizeCallback, 10 )
		jQuery( this ).animate( { 'height': HighlanderComments.initialHeight } ).delay( 100 ).queue( function(n) { clearInterval( timer ); HighlanderComments.resizeCallback(); n(); } );
		jQuery( '#comment-form-identity' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#comment-form-subscribe' ).slideDown();
		jQuery( '#commentform .form-submit' ).slideDown();
	});
}
jQuery(document).ready( highlander_expando_javascript );
</script>

			var oldonload = window.onload;
			if (typeof window.onload != 'function') {
				window.onload = func;
			} else {
				window.onload = function () {

}

</style>
<link rel='stylesheet' id='all-css-2-1' href='https://s2.wp.com/_static/??-eJyFj1ELwjAMhP+QNQ7cYA/ib+lqrNW2KUtG2b8380VFqG93x30hB7UYR1kwC8gNEzKUZQKpGqyawhTJPXjvmHfwr8uyRjS1OEo/QFpMiYsPmaGGi0dhECqmEKt6gS3EIxl9xEqg/GXMNdowt9AZdYJX6UFbH7YFWbcdn+z8Vlv9nE5dPxyOw9iN/f0Jyxl21w==?cssminify=yes' type='text/css' media='all' />
